title: How to Download Extensions for Microsoft Edge

steps.title: Click the three dots in the top-right corner and then click Extensions.
steps.content: Click the three dots in the top-right corner and then click Extensions . A page will popup showing all your extensions. If this is your first time clicking on it, you should have no extensions installed.

steps.title: Click "Get extensions for Microsoft Edge".
steps.content: Click "Get extensions for Microsoft Edge". A new tab should pop up with all the available extensions you can install.

steps.title: Find what extension you want.
steps.content: Find what extension you want. There will be a search bar, filters, and other features that can help you find an extension.

steps.title: Click on the extension you want.
steps.content: Click on the extension you want. A page about it's description, ratings, and other useful information should pop up.

steps.title: Press Get to install the extension.
steps.content: Press Get to install the extension. Some extensions cost money, but most of them are free.

steps.title: Wait for it to finish installing.
steps.content: Wait for it to finish installing. Once you've installed your extension, it should appear in the top-right corner. Click on it and see what it does. Each extension is different and performs a different task. If you don't know how to use it, check the description of the extension and it should tell you all the information about the extension.

steps.title: Navigate to the Chrome Web Store.
steps.content: Navigate to the Chrome Web Store. This is located at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/ .

steps.title: Select "Allow extensions from other stores" and confirm.
steps.content: Select "Allow extensions from other stores" and confirm. This will enable the installation of third-party extensions.

steps.title: Find what extension you want.
steps.content: Find what extension you want. There will be a search bar, filters, and other features that can help you find an extension.

steps.title: Click on the extension you want.
steps.content: Click on the extension you want. A page about it's description, ratings, and other useful information should pop up.

steps.title: Press Add to Chrome to install the extension.
steps.content: Press Add to Chrome to install the extension. Some extensions cost money, but most of them are free.

steps.title: Wait for it to finish installing.
steps.content: Wait for it to finish installing. Once you've installed your extension, it should appear in the top-right corner. Click on it and see what it does. Each extension is different and performs a different task. If you don't know how to use it, check the description of the extension and it should tell you all the information about the extension.
